name: It Is Your Destiny - P. 1 C. 1
name_original: It Is Your Destiny - P. 1 C. 1
description:
Attention!! Before You Play, Read the following:

. This game is a great challenge and want to make you fearless. Play stronger and more concentrated after dying! Don't be afraid of death! It is supposed to be played the way I made it so it's performance-based game and not quality.

. All events in this game are chained together and none of them can be skipped nor speedrunned!

. Read the guides carefully, take them serious and don't forget them!

. If there's any issue or bug, leave comment so I can fix! Thank you so much for playing my friends :D

Everything in this game was made by me, Benyamin a.k.a I'm Vegan, a solo dev, with a partial assistance of Vespineauto007

Uploaded on: 02/19/2023
